Class KnuthAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • KnuthAlgorithm

  • public class KnuthAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KnuthAlgorithm()
      Default empty constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayStats()
      Displays the statistics that would be calculated using performStats() Since the algorithm used involves no random number generation and will perform the same for each case every time, for demonstration purposes in order to save time, this method can be run instead of performStats().
      void performStats()
      Performs statistics on the the guessing algorithm.
      void setSleepTime(int sleepTime)
      Sets the sleep time in between the copmuter's guesses when running solve()
      int solve(java.lang.String solution)
      Solves a puzzle with a given solution

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • KnuthAlgorithm

        public KnuthAlgorithm()
        Default empty constructor. Nothing needs to be initialized

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public int solve(java.lang.String solution)
        Solves a puzzle with a given solution
        Parameters:
        solution - The solution to the puzzle
        Returns:
        returns the number of guesses it took to find the answer

      • performStats

        public void performStats()
        Performs statistics on the the guessing algorithm. Solves every single possible puzzle returns maximum turn and average turns to solve the puzzles.

      • displayStats

        public void displayStats()
        Displays the statistics that would be calculated using performStats() Since the algorithm used involves no random number generation and will perform the same for each case every time, for demonstration purposes in order to save time, this method can be run instead of performStats().

      • setSleepTime

        public void setSleepTime(int sleepTime)
        Sets the sleep time in between the copmuter's guesses when running solve()
        Parameters:
        sleepTime - the time to sleep in milliseconds (Default 1500)
